titleStmt.title: Certain weighty considerations humbly tendered and submitted to the consideration of such of the members of the High Court of Justice for tryal of the King, as they shall be presented unto. There being onely one hundred of the copies appointed to be printed for that purpose By Josuah Sprigge.
titleStmt.author: Sprigg, Joshua, 1618-1684.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
